turn on:
CheckProp(off)
CheckPropValue(battery)
EnableProp(battery)
AddProp(type / source of light)
ChangeProp(off, on)
turn off:
CheckProp(on)
RemoveProp(source of light)
DisableProp(battery)
ChangeProp(on, off)

water:
CheckProp(!dead)
RequireItemWithProp(water)
ChangeProp(drying, +*water)
DisableProp(drying)
ChangeProp(fine, +*water)
EnableProp(fine)
